2COR 1.6 aþþan jaþþe þreihanda in izwaraizos gaþlaihtais jah naseinais þizos waurstweigons in stiwitja þizo samono þulaine, þozei jah weis winnam, jah wens unsara gatulgida faur izwis;
jaþþe gaþrafstjanda in izwaraizos gaþlaihtais jah naseinais, 2COR 1.7 witandans þatei swaswe gadailans þulaine sijuþ, jah gaþlaihtais wairþiþ.
...2COR 1.8 swaswe afswaggwidai weseima jalliban.

2COR 1.9 akei silbans in uns silbam andahaft dauþaus habaidedum, ei ni sijaima trauandans du uns silbam, ak du guda þamma urraisjandin dauþans, 2COR 1.10 izei us swaleikaim dauþum uns galausida jah galauseiþ, du þammei wenidedum ei galauseiþ, 2COR 1.11 at hilpandam jah izwis bi uns bidai, ei in managamma andwairþja so in uns giba þairh managans awiliudodau faur uns.

2COR 1.12 unte ƕoftuli unsara so ist, weitwodei miþwisseins unsaraizos, þatei in ainfalþein jah hlutrein gudis, ni in handugein leikeinai, ak in anstai gudis usmetum in þamma fairƕau, iþ ufarassau at izwis.
2COR 1.13 unte ni alja meljam izwis, alja þoei anakunnaiþ aiþþau jah ufkunnaiþ;
aþþan wenja ei und andi ufkunnaiþ, 2COR 1.14 swaswe gakunnaideduþ uns bi sumata, unte ƕoftuli izwara sijum, swaswe jah jus unsara in daga fraujins Iesuis.

2COR 1.15 jah þizai trauainai wilda faurþis qiman at izwis, ei anþara anst habaidedeiþ, 2COR 1.16 jaþþairh izwis galeiþan in Makaidonja jah aftra af Makaidonjai qiman at izwis, jah fram izwis gasandjan mik in Iudaia.
2COR 1.17 þat-uþ-þan nu mitonds, ibai aufto leihtis bruhta?
aiþþau þatei mito, bi leika þagkjau, ei sijai at mis þata ja ja jah þata ne ne?
2COR 1.18 aþþan triggws guþ, ei þata waurd unsar þata du izwis nist ja janne.
2COR 1.19 unte gudis sunus Iesus Xristus, saei in izwis þairh uns merjada, þairh mik jah Silbanu jah Teimauþaiu, ni warþ ja janne, ak ja in imma warþ.
2COR 1.20 ƕaiwa managa gahaita gudis, in imma þata ja,
duþþe jaþþairh ina amen, guda du wulþau þairh uns.
2COR 1.21 aþþan sa gaþwastjands uns miþ izwis in Xristau jah salbonds uns guþ, 2COR 1.22 jah sigljands uns jah gibands wadi ahman in hairtona unsara.
2COR 1.23 aþþan ik weitwod guþ anahaita ana meinai saiwalai ei freidjands izwara þanaseiþs ni qam in Kaurinþon;
2COR 1.24 ni þatei fraujinoma izwarai galaubeinai, ak gawaurstwans sijum anstais izwaraizos,
unte galaubeinai gastoþuþ.
2COR 2.1 Aþþan gastauida þata silbo at mis, ei aftra in saurgai ni qimau at izwis.
2COR 2.2 unte jabai ik gaurja izwis, jah ƕas ist saei gailjai mik, niba sa gaurida us mis?
2COR 2.3 jaþþata silbo gamelida izwis, ei qimands saurga ni habau fram þaimei skulda faginon, gatrauands in allaim izwis þatei meina faheþs allaize izwara ist.
2COR 2.4 aþþan us managai aglon jah aggwiþai hairtins gamelida izwis þairh managa tagra, ni þeei saurgaiþ, ak ei frijaþwa kunneiþ þoei haba ufarassau du izwis.
2COR 2.5 aþþan jabai ƕas gaurida, ni mik gaurida, ak bi sum ain, ei ni anakaurjau, allans izwis.
2COR 2.6 ganah þamma swaleikamma andabeit þata fram managizam, 2COR 2.7 swaei þata andaneiþo izwis mais fragiban jaggaþlaihan, ibai aufto managizein saurgai gasiggqai sa swaleiks.
2COR 2.8 in-uþ-þis bidja izwis tulgjan in imma friaþwa.
2COR 2.9 duþþe gamelida ei ufkunnau kustu izwarana, sijaidu in allamma ufhausjandans.
2COR 2.10 aþþan þammei ƕa fragibiþ, jah ik;
jah þan ik, jabai ƕa fragaf, fragaf in izwara in andwairþja Xristaus, 2COR 2.11 ei ni gaaiginondau fram Satanin;
unte ni sijum unwitandans munins is.
2COR 2.12 aþþan qimands in Trauadai in aiwaggeljons Xristaus jah at haurdai mis uslukanai in fraujin, 2COR 2.13 ni habaida gaƕeilain ahmin meinamma, in þammei ni bigat Teitaun broþar meinana;
